name: Lotto Scratch Off -Illustrator
description:
This scratch card game is suitable for all ages.

Scratch tickets features:

★ Gorgeous Scratch-its style
★ Scratchcard can be move / zoom in / zoom out
★ Various scratch-off winning modes
★ Lots of scratching tools
★ Various topic of Instant lottery(lotteries)
★ Scratchies can be shared to friends
★ Release new lotto scratch tickets frequently

Try your luck today with Bunny Scratch!!
